sentences.en: ‘He’s a lawyer?’ Mum looked suitably impressed (= as impressed as you would expect ).
sentences.cn: “他是个律师？”妈妈看上去果然对他印象颇好。

sentences.en: A style consultant will demonstrate how to dress to impress.
sentences.cn: 时尚顾问将示范如何穿着以给人留下深刻印象。

sentences.en: Ask young Harry to do it — he's still an eager beaver and wants to impress by his willingness.
sentences.cn: 请年轻的亨利干吧——他仍然是个雄心勃勃的人,并努力使人对他的投入留下深刻印象.

sentences.en: Bad thoughts had put a shade into his eyes which did not impress others favourably.
sentences.cn: 不愉快的想法给他的眼睛蒙上了一层阴影,不会给人留下好的印象.

sentences.en: Don't try to impress the new boss, he hates being sucked up to.
sentences.cn: 休要去新上司面前显弄, 他不吃马屁.

sentences.en: Make the extra effort to impress the buyer and you will be rewarded with a quicker sale.
sentences.cn: 多用心去打动顾客，货物就会更快售出。

sentences.en: Rick is slightly smarmy and eager to impress.
sentences.cn: 里克有些好奉承，急着要给人留下好印象。

sentences.en: She played up her past achievementsjust to impress us.
sentences.cn: 她夸耀过去的成绩就是为了让我们觉得她了不起.

sentences.en: Steve borrowed his dad’s sports car to impress his girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫借来他爸爸的跑车向女友炫耀。

sentences.en: The boys were vying to impress her.
sentences.cn: 小伙子们争着给她留下好印象。

sentences.en: The boys were vying with each other to impress her.
sentences.cn: 小伙子们争着给她留下好印象.

sentences.en: The Russian people do impress me with their stamina, patriotism, and sheer numbers.
sentences.cn: 俄国人的干劲 、 爱国热情和人多势众倒确实给我留下了深刻印象.

sentences.en: The sights of the city never fail to impress foreign tourists.
sentences.cn: 外国游客无一不对该市留有深刻印象.

sentences.en: The size of the castle and its commanding position still impress the visitor today.
sentences.cn: 城堡很大，加上其居高临下的位置，至今仍让参观者赞叹不已。

sentences.en: Their honesty and hospitality left an enduring impress on her life.
sentences.cn: 他们的诚实与好客给她一生留下了难以磨灭的印象.

sentences.en: Time has left its impress upon him.
sentences.cn: 岁月在他身上留下了印记.

sentences.en: Your very effective recital of British war effort will greatly impress world public opinion.
sentences.cn: 你对于英国在大战中的努力作了很精辟的报告,这将使世界舆论得到深刻的印象.

words.tran_cn: 敏感的；感受性强烈的；易感动的
印象派的；印象主义的；给人深刻印象的
感人的；令人钦佩的；给人以深刻印象的
印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想
印象主义者；印象派作家
强行征用；征召；强制征兵
盖印；强征；传送；给予某人深刻印象

phrases.tran_cn: 使牢记；给…留下印象；留下印记

trans.tran_cn: 使敬佩，给…深刻印象，使铭记，使…意识到，给…留下…印象
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel admiration and respect
to make someone feel admiration and respect
